dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.description:
Give a short and descriptive name for the dataset.

The URL is created automatically based on the dataset title. You can edit the URL if you want.

dataset_fields.label: Dataset maintainer
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: e.g. Digital and Population Data Services Agency
dataset_fields.description: The dataset maintainer will receive updates about the dataset to the email address specified in this form. We recommend using a general email address instead of the contact information of a single employee. Note that the dataset information can only be managed by registered users with Editor- or Admin-rights in the publishing organisation.

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.description: Select a license that suits your needs. We recommend using CC0 or CC BY 4 -licenses.

dataset_fields.label: Keywords
dataset_fields.description: Keywords help users to find your data. Select at least one keyword in Finnish.

dataset_fields.label: High value dataset
dataset_fields.description: You can mark dataset as high value dataset

dataset_fields.label: Links to additional information
dataset_fields.description: Add links to one or more websites with additional information about the data.

dataset_fields.label: Update frequency

resource_fields.form_placeholder: e.g. Most popular Finnish first names 2019
resource_fields.description: Write a short and descriptive name for the data resource. If the data covers a specific time frame, mention that in the name.

resource_fields.label: Format
resource_fields.description: File format of the selected resource.

resource_fields.label: Distribution visibility
resource_fields.description: You can set the visibility to private temporarily for example if the distribution is missing some information. Private distributions are visible to all members of the producer-organisation.

resource_fields.label: Data status
resource_fields.description: Define a state for the data. This is recommended especially if your dataset has data resources from multiple years.

resource_fields.label: Coordinate system
resource_fields.description: If your data includes geographic information, specify the coordinate system it uses.

resource_fields.label: Temporal granularity
resource_fields.description: Select the time frame by which the data is separated. For example, does the resource include data from every week or month.

resource_fields.label: Geographical accuracy
resource_fields.description: If your data includes geographic information, specify the accuracy in meters
